summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackILIA Balmy Tint Hydrating Lip Balm is a clean tinted lip balm with potent levels of moisture-boosting ingredients and sheer, buildable color.
details: DetailsBenefitsSheer, buildable colorBalmy finishMoisturizing, nourishing formula8 easy-to-wear shadesFormulated without gluten or siliconeKey IngredientsSea Succulent - Dramatically boosts hydration levels for lips that feel smooth and suppleRosehip Oil - Rich in fatty acids that help to nourish and soften lipsShea Butter - Creates a protective barrier to help lock in moistureItem 2629329How To UseApply to lips straight from the bullet - no mirror needed. Swipe once for a sheer wash of color. Keep swiping for more payoff. Reapply as needed throughout the day.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire d'abeille, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, Mica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Jojoba Esters, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Cera/Wax, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Vanillin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Acacia Decurrens Flower Cera/Wax, Polyglycerin-3, Salicornia Herbacea Extract. May Contain: CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 73360 (Red 30 Lake), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 16035 (Red 40 Lake).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to lips straight from the bullet - no mirror needed. Swipe once for a sheer wash of color. Keep swiping for more payoff. Reapply as needed throughout the day.
ingredients: Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla

reviews.headline: A Staple in My Make-up Bag
reviews.comments: I bought this because my favorite lipstick was no longer being sold and I saw the beautiful colors. I purchased memoir and just went back today to buy it again. Such a pretty shade, creamy and moisturizing yet wears well. I absolutely love it!

reviews.headline: I will  by this product again !
Drying and Irritating – Wish I Could Return It
reviews.comments: This tinted lip balm leaves my lips extremely dry after each use. Like others have mentioned, it actually makes lips drier and causes a tingling sensation. My lips ended up feeling irritated, chapped, and almost burning. If you have sensitive skin, I'd avoid this

reviews.headline: Nice Surprise
reviews.comments: I ordered the first one because I love tinted lip balm. The photos made it look like it's more pigmented than the usual variety, and it is, a lot more pigments. As another reviewer said, I'd call it a medium-coverage, moisturizing lipstick. The colors are wonderful, I've actually purchased two more. The finish is satin rather than shiny or matte (thank you!!). They aren't greasy, so if your lips are cracked, these won't do it for you. I wear them all day in dry, forced-air heating, and my lips have stayed nice and moisturized.

reviews.headline: Lipstick masquerading as a tinted balm
reviews.comments: I like the color, but this feels more like a lipstick than a balm. It has a chalky texture and a weird taste/smell—not terrible but just reminds me of a lipstick rather than a balm. It's heavy in coverage/texture and not light and smooth like I expected.

reviews.headline: TOTALLY WORTH IT
reviews.comments: Dont hesitate to buy! Love the one I got & definitely gonna buy again!

reviews.headline: Great lip color
reviews.comments: This was my first purchase of Ilia and I will definitely try more products. The lip balm is very creamy and moisturizing. The color is very pigmented and you don't need a lot, which I love because it will last a while!

faceoff_positive.comments: I do think it's a good lip product, but not exactly what it claims to be. In the description it claims that it is a tinted lip balm and that you should wipe once for a sheer hint of color. In reality, maybe because it is soft, one wipe will be enough for almost a medium coverage. I was expecting more of a balm with a very transparent tint for a natural look so I was a bit disappointed. If you like a soft, medium coverage lipstick for dry lips this will be great for you.   Color Wise, I ordered memoir, a natural mauve, a good description for the color that came. The photos are also a good representation for the color. Do notice that its a bit brighter, cooler and darker in person then in the photos.  The texture is mostly what I was expecting, it is soft and buttery, and will keep your lips moisturized. The down side is that if you live in a hot country like me it may become softer and a little messy. A good solution is to store it in the refrigerator when you are not taking it with you.  Excuse me for my bad English and I hope it helped!
faceoff_positive.headline: It is a good product, I was just expecting something differe

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to love the new balm, but it is just not the same. It sits weirdly on the lips, feels heavy and actually dries my lips, leaving them patchy. I also get a tingly sensation in the lips, I don't know if it's a reaction to some of the ingredients…I still have some left from the old formula and I don't get the same sensations while applying the old tinted lip conditioner. I used to wear 'forever' lipstick everyday. I'd put it on and forget I have anything on my lips, the color lasted longer and it was the only lipstick that could make my lips look alive in a very dry climate. Unfortunately I can't say the same about the new one. It's an ok balm and the colors are still beautiful and flattering, but I wish you didn't change the formula. It was a perfect sheer lipstick and having tried many from other brands, I really think it was the best. Maybe this new product is just not for me. Having said all that, I really like everything else from Ilia and a big fan of the color block lipstick in Rococo.
faceoff_negative.headline: miss the old formula
